command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway04.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 8iSeDwDvmz89ZkL.root --database RbfyiLrhMviQ3PcSkhsuqX --execute 
SELECT type, count, latest FROM (
  SELECT 'papers' as type, COUNT(*) as count, MAX(publishedAt) as latest FROM papers WHERE publishedAt >= '2026-03-01'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'news_items', COUNT(*), MAX(publishedAt) FROM news_items WHERE publishedAt >= '2026-03-01'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'products', COUNT(*), MAX(publishedAt) FROM products WHERE publishedAt >= '2026-03-01'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'insights', COUNT(*), MAX(publishedAt) FROM insights WHERE publishedAt >= '2026-03-01'
) t;
SELECT headline, subheadline, LEFT(content, 100) as content_preview, publishedAt FROM insights ORDER BY publishedAt DESC LIMIT 3;
